SELECT A.cctv_no ,A.cctv_nm ,A.district_no ,B.district_nm ,A.rtsp_conn_yn ,TO_CHAR(A.rtsp_last_check_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS rtsp_last_check_dt ,A.maint_sts_cd ,C.code_nm AS maint_sts_nm ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.inst_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inst_ymd ,A.model_nm ,A.cctv_maker ,A.cctv_ip ,A.web_port ,A.rtsp_port ,A.cctv_conn_id ,A.cctv_conn_pwd ,A.relay_nm ,A.relay_ip ,A.relay_port ,A.cctv_lat ,A.cctv_lon ,A.admin_center ,A.partner_comp_id ,D.partner_comp_nm ,A.partner_comp_user_nm ,A.partner_comp_user_phone ,A.etc1 ,A.etc2 ,A.etc3 FROM tb_cctv_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_district_info B ON A.district_no = B.district_no LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_common_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'MTN000') C ON A.maint_sts_cd = C.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_maintcomp_info D ON A.partner_comp_id = D.partner_comp_id where 1=1
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT count(A.cctv_no) FROM tb_cctv_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_district_info B ON A.district_no = B.district_no LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_common_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'MTN000') C ON A.maint_sts_cd = C.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_maintcomp_info D ON A.partner_comp_id = D.partner_comp_id where 1=1
SELECT A.cctv_no , A.cctv_ip , A.web_port , A.rtsp_port , A.cctv_conn_id , A.cctv_conn_pwd From tb_cctv_info A WHERE A.cctv_no = #{cctv_no}

SELECT COUNT(A.cctv_no) AS allCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER ( WHERE COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_ip), ''), NULL) IS NULL OR A.web_port IS NULL OR COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_conn_id), ''), NULL) IS NULL OR COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_conn_pwd), ''), NULL) IS NULL ) AS errCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER ( WHERE COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_ip), ''), NULL) IS NOT NULL AND A.web_port IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_conn_id), ''), NULL) IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(NULLIF(BTRIM(A.cctv_conn_pwd), ''), NULL) IS NOT NULL ) AS conCnt FROM tb_cctv_info A LEFT JOIN tb_district_info B ON A.district_no = B.district_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_common_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'MTN000') C ON A.maint_sts_cd = C.code_id LEFT JOIN tb_maintcomp_info D ON A.partner_comp_id = D.partner_comp_id WHERE 1=1
